Text.Page: I never get sick of seeing your smiling face, <PCNAME>.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Nor I yours."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

I just love small talk, don't you? Let's stand here all day and say nice things to each other.

Or, you could go see if {@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} has any work for you. I know how much you enjoy that.

I know this gathering business must be utterly beneath you, but you're just here for the money anyway, right?

I know, I know, we're all in this together. "For the federation" and so forth.

Well, enjoy the outside world while you get today's shipments. I sure as shetla never get to see it.

{@RawItem:206801}. This stuff is infinitely useful if you know what to do with it.

Thank you! Tell {@linkcreature:63#3003#Elthienne} I'll have her item crafted in no time.
Get me the {@RawItem:206801}, or I swear I'll cry like a baby. You don't want to see that, do you?
Thank you for {@RawItem:206802}. {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} has a little something for your trouble.
Get me the {@RawItem:206802}, or I swear I'll cry like a baby. You don't want to see that, do you?
Thank you for {@RawItem:206803}. {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} has a little something for your trouble.
Get me the {@RawItem:206803}, or I swear I'll cry like a baby. You don't want to see that, do you?
Thank you for {@RawItem:206804}. {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} has a little something for your trouble.
Get me the {@RawItem:206804}, or I swear I'll cry like a baby. You don't want to see that, do you?
Thank you for {@RawItem:206805}. {@LinkCreature:63#3003#Elthienne} has a little something for your trouble.
Get me the {@RawItem:206805}, or I swear I'll cry like a baby. You don't want to see that, do you?

Did {@LinkCreature:63#3002#Taratia} tell you I'm no good at crafting? That witch!

I made this stylish belt, I'll have you know.
